segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, and it’s spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn’t even seem to care, which is shocking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is already on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the drain is clogged or if she just forgot to turn it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to slip if they’re not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole kitchen is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s in a trance, completely ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
